title: Stage S18
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I'm saving money because I want to travel.
Since it's raining, we should stay inside.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 여행을 하고 싶어서 돈을 모으고 있어요. (이유)
sentences.en: I'm saving money because I want to travel.

sentences.kr: 비가 오니까 안에 있어야 해요. (원인)
sentences.en: Since it's raining, we should stay inside.

sentences.kr: 좋은 자리를 잡기 위해 일찍 왔어요. (목적)
sentences.en: She came early so that she could get a good seat.

sentences.kr: 더 좋은 직장을 얻기 위해 영어를 공부해요.
sentences.en: I study English in order to get a better job.

sentences.kr: 나쁜 날씨 때문에 회의가 취소되었어요.
sentences.en: The meeting was canceled due to bad weather.

sentences.kr: 교통 체증 때문에 늦었어요.
sentences.en: I was late because of the traffic jam.

sentences.kr: 시험에 합격하기 위해 열심히 공부하고 있어요.
sentences.en: He's studying hard so he can pass the exam.

sentences.kr: 러시아워 교통을 피하기 위해 일찍 떠났어요.
sentences.en: We left early to avoid the rush hour traffic.

sentences.kr: 자금 부족으로 인해 프로젝트가 실패했어요.
sentences.en: The project failed owing to lack of funding.

sentences.kr: 밖이 추워서 코트를 입었어요.
sentences.en: She wore a coat as it was cold outside.
